# pwpusher Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    pwpusher = {
      source = "hashicorp.com/edu/pwpusher"
    }
  }
}
provider "pwpusher" {
  # example configuration here
  url = "http://localhost:5100"
}


resource "pwpusher_text" "example" {
  password = "some-value2"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `url` (String) The URL for the pwpusher service
